sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const{ id}=useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetch(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL+'/product/'+id) .then(res => res.json()) .then( res => setproduct(res.product)) },[]) function ProductDetail() { return
< div className="col-12 col-lg-5 mt-5">

Dell Inspiron 3511 Laptop, Intel i3-1115G4, 8GB, 512GB

Product # 387874kkfjkf

$456.00

- +

Status: In Stock

Description:

Processor: Intel i5-1235U (3.30 GHz up to 4.40 GHz), 10 Cores & 12MB Cache RAM & Storage: 8GB, 8Gx1, DDR4, 2666MHz Ach & 512GB SSD Display & Graphics: 15.6" FHD WVA AG 120Hz 250 nits Narrow Border & Integrated Graphics

Sold by: Amazon

} export default ProductDetail;
